name: Agatha
location: Woven branch dome in Neverwinter Wood (NW of Conyberry)

goals: Punish the living for disturbing her
personality.appearance: Cold pale light coalescing into spectral female elf. Hair and robes wave in spectral wind. Hateful expression twists once-beautiful features.
personality.speech: Icy disdain. 'Foolish mortals. What do you want here? Do you not know it is death to seek me out?'

lair: Dome of woven branches. Sparsely furnished: chests, shelves, table, reclined couch. Old elven craft.
manifestation: Senses intruders. Appears when they enter her home.
negotiation: DC 15 Persuasion (advantage if well roleplayed). Auto-success with Sister Garaele's silver comb as gift.
reaction_rude: If disrespected, scowls and disappears. Won't return. Doesn't attack.
reaction_polite: Smiles with cold amusement. 'Very well. Ask me one question, and I will give you an answer.'
knowledge: Knows nearly anything about region. Well-informed diviner. Can answer any one question pertaining to adventure.

answers.bowgentle: Traded spellbook to Tsernoth of Iriaebor 100+ years ago. Doesn't know what happened after.
answers.old_owl_well: Wizard's name was Arthindol (if asked for Hamun Kost)
